column4: I am having an issue with the live cd, i can't get it load, i mean like, i can get it to show me all the loading stuff, then the screen goes blank, i can access the virtual terminals with the ctrl+alt+f5 and what not, but not the gui desktop, i've searched the forums, attempted the corrections found on ubuntu.com but can't figure out the issue
no, but try safe graphics mode on the first screen
I believe F8 brings up the advanced options
